result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Bail Bond Deposit Acknowledgement
Letter to the payor of the defendant's bail requesting him to fill out the enclosed forms of "Cash Bail Payment Confirmation" and "Bail Bond Deposit Acknowledgement".
Return date on November 7, 2022 at 10:30 am.

11:01 AM Defendant RICKI M AULT in court, in custody.  Attorney Michael J Kapelis in court for RICKI M AULT.  Attorney Matthew Steven McElroy in court for State of Wisconsin. Atty Kapelis states def will be waiving the prelim. Def concurs. Court instructs the defendant regarding his/her right to a preliminary examination. Defendant waives his/her right to a preliminary examination. Court finds probable cause. Court accepts the waiver of the prelim and binds the defendant over for trial. 

State files an information with the court and confirms it mirrors the complaint. Attorney Kapelis acknowledges receipt of the information and waives any reading and confirms it mirrors the complaint. Atty Kapelis enters a plea of Not Guilty on behalf of the defendant. Court will set for Return Date November 7, 2022 at 10:30 AM.

Atty Kapelis requests bond modification per motion previously filed. ADA objects to bond modification. Court denies motion to modify bond.

Court adjourned at 11:05 AM.
Defendant is to maintain absolute sobriety - not to possess or consume any alcohol, illegal drugs or prescription drugs without a valid prescription.  You may be randomly tested for compliance.
Preliminary Hearing - Schedule or Waiver on August 16, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Defendant is to maintain absolute sobriety - not to possess or consume any alcohol, illegal drugs or prescription drugs without a valid prescription.  You may be randomly tested for compliance.

9:48 AM Defendant RICKI M AULT in court, in custody.  Attorney Michael J Kapelis appeared by video for RICKI M AULT.  Attorney Matthew Steven McElroy in court for State of Wisconsin. Atty Kapelis confirms receipt of the criminal complaint and waives reading. Court instructs the defendant of the maximum penalty on each count. Statement by Atty kapelis regarding bond. Court amends bond to $500 cash and all other conditions remain. Court instructs defendant regarding his/her right to a preliminary hearing. Defendant waives the time limits. Court will set for Status of Prelim on August 16, 2022 at 10:30 AM.

Court adjourned at 9:50 AM
(Atty Michael Kapelis)
**PROCESSING COMPLETE**
